title: Scimitar +1
content:
Scimitar +1 Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6+1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The phases of the moon are carved into the hilt of this scimitar, betraying a druid's careful hand. Scimitar Light Finesse 1.35 40

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The phases of the moon are carved into the hilt of this scimitar, betraying a druid's careful hand.

Scimitar Light Finesse

Scimitar +1 is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate
